SELECT a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, GROUP_CONCAT(atr.article_tag) as tag, CASE WHEN p.article_categories IS NULL THEN c.article_categories ELSE CONCAT(p.article_categories, '/', c.article_categories) END AS category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON a.article_id = atr.article_id LEFT JOIN article_categories c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN article_categories p ON c.parent_id = p.id WHERE a.article_id = #{article_id} AND a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, c.article_categories, p.article_categories, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status

SELECT a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, GROUP_CONCAT(atr.article_tag) as tag, CASE WHEN p.article_categories IS NULL THEN c.article_categories ELSE CONCAT(p.article_categories, '/', c.article_categories) END AS category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON a.article_id = atr.article_id LEFT JOIN article_categories c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN article_categories p ON c.parent_id = p.id WHERE a.alias = #{alias} AND a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, c.article_categories, p.article_categories, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status
